Rule_Description: BIS certification number must be present on label
MRP must be printed on outer packaging
Manufacturer address must match registration
FCC ID must be visible on product
Country of origin label required in English
CE marking must be minimum 5mm height
FSSAI license number must appear on front label
Nutritional information table must be present
Best before date must be in DD/MM/YYYY format
Allergen declaration must be highlighted in bold
Net quantity must be in metric units
Ingredient list must be in descending order by weight
Batch number and manufacturing date must be present
List of ingredients must use INCI names
Shelf life after opening must be indicated
Warning statements must be in English
Age recommendation must be printed on packaging
Safety warning for choking hazard must be present
ASTM F963 compliance statement required
EN 71 safety standard reference must be on label
ISI mark must be embossed or printed on product
Wattage and voltage rating must be visible
Declaration of Conformity document must be included
Food-safe material certification must be attached
